globalHeaders.content-security-policy: img-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' data: https:; script-src *.twimg.com *.twitter.com *.google-analytics.com 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; style-src *.twimg.com *.twitter.com 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; default-src *.twitter.com 'self'; connect-src *.vaccinehunters.ca *.azurewebsites.net 'self';
